page.title: 08 - EDUCATION
page.content:
There are no local authority schools actually in the survey area but Duncton C.of E. Primary School is close by.
5 to 10 year-olds attend school at Duncton, Petworth & Fittleworth,10 to 13 year-olds go to the Herbert Shiner School at Petworth, while senior pupils, age 13 plus have to travel to Midhurst Comprehensive.
There is a private school for girls in the grounds of Burton Park called St. Michaels, occupying a large country house which was originally the residence of the Courtauld family of textile fame, and who left shortly after the second world war. The school has built many new extensions to the original property in recent years.
